title: Crowndfund
description: CrowdFund is a dynamic platform designed for entrepreneurs and creators to showcase their crowdfunding campaigns through detailed project pages, multimedia galleries, and real-time progress updates.

title: Ohme
description: Ohme is an intuitive mobile and web app designed to help homeowners monitor and optimize their energy consumption. Users can connect smart meters, appliances, and IoT devices to track real-time usage data across electricity, gas, and water.

title: Asteroids Game
description: Asteroids Remake is a modern recreation of the classic arcade game, built with P5.js and JavaScript. Players control a spaceship to destroy asteroids, avoid collisions, and score points while upgrading weapons.

title: MediDirect App
description: MediDirect is a healthcare app that allows users to view detailed information about doctors, manage prescriptions, schedule appointments, and access patient records securely through an intuitive interface.

title: Reality Report App
description: Reality Report is a news aggregation app that curates real-time articles, videos, and updates on global events. Users can customize feeds, save favorites, and share content across social platforms.

title: AnimalWiki
description: Animal Wiki is an interactive encyclopedia app featuring detailed profiles of various animals, including facts, habitats, behaviors, and images. Users can search, filter by categories, and learn about wildlife conservation.
